entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione seemed to have spotted this problem too; she gave Harry a quizzical look.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry bent down, ducked under the tent flap, and felt his jaw drop.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley dropped to his hands and knees and entered the first tent.

entities.name: perkins
entities.description: Mr. Weasley said Perkins at the office doesn't camp much anymore.

Mr. Weasley said he borrowed this from Perkins at the office.
Harry bent down, ducked under the tent flap, and felt his jaw drop as Mr. Weasley entered the first tent.
